1.name: After coating myself in vegetable oil I found my success rate skyrocketed
1.description: Homesickness became contagious in the young campers' cabin

2.name: His ultimate dream fantasy consisted of being content
2.description: I come from a tribe of head-hunters, so I will never need a shrink

3.name: The efficiency we have at removing trash has made creating trash more acceptable
3.description: The old rusted farm equipment surrounded the house predicting its demise
